name: Emoncms
description: Emoncms is an open-source web application for processing, logging and visualising energy, temperature and other environmental data.

SDGs.evidenceText: Emoncms is an open-source web application for processing, logging and visualising energy, temperature and other environmental data. It is a part of the OpenEnergyMonitor project. It helps users understand energy, explore the context of renewable energy and zero carbon
